maya/beastmayaplugin/src/dgmessagemanager.cpp

#include "dgmessagemanager.h"
#include "jobcontext.h"
#include "mayautils.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastscenewrapper.h"
#include "scenemanager.h"
#include "mayanodes/nodeids.h"

namespace beastmaya {

        DGMessageManager::DGMessageManager(JobContext& bjc): m_bjc(bjc) {
                MStatus res;
                m_ids.push_back(MDGMessage::addNodeAddedCallback(objectAdded, kDefaultNodeType, this, &res));
                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
                m_ids.push_back(MDGMessage::addNodeRemovedCallback(objectRemoved, kDefaultNodeType, this, &res));
                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
                m_ids.push_back(MDGMessage::addConnectionCallback(objectConnectionChange, this, &res));
                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        }

        DGMessageManager::~DGMessageManager() {
                for(auto i = begin(m_ids); i != end(m_ids); ++i) {
                        MMessage::removeCallback(*i);
                }
        }

        void DGMessageManager::objectAdded(MObject& node, void* clientData) {
                bool supportedType = false;

                if (node.hasFn(MFn::kLight) || node.hasFn(MFn::kMesh)) {
                        supportedType = true;
                }

                if (!supportedType)
                        return;

                // Meshes aren't always finished entirely when arriving here, so let's do it deferred
                if(node.hasFn(MFn::kMesh)) {
                        DGMessageManager* oc = (DGMessageManager*)clientData;
                        JobContext& bjc = oc->m_bjc;
                        bjc.getSceneManager().getLiveResourceManager().postUpdate(node);
                        return;
                }

                MStatus res;
                MFnDagNode dagNode(node, &res);

                DGMessageManager* oc = (DGMessageManager*)clientData;
                JobContext& bjc = oc->m_bjc;
                BeastCameraPtr cp;

                if(res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        // Get path to transform and export
                        MDagPath dagPath;
                        res = dagNode.getPath(dagPath);
                        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);
                        dagPath.pop();
                        exportDagNode(dagPath, bjc.getSceneManager(), cp);
                }
        }

        void DGMessageManager::objectRemoved(MObject& node, void* clientData) {         
                DGMessageManager* oc = (DGMessageManager*)clientData;
                JobContext& bjc = oc->m_bjc;
                removeNode(node, bjc.getSceneManager());
        }

        void DGMessageManager::objectConnectionChange(MPlug &srcPlug, MPlug &destPlug, bool made, void *clientData) {
                if(!made) {
                        return;
                }

                if(srcPlug.node().hasFn(MFn::kPolyPrimitive) && destPlug.node().hasFn(MFn::kMesh)) {
                        // We detected a mesh creation
                        MStatus res;
                        MFnDagNode dagNode(destPlug.node(), &res);
                        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);
                        DGMessageManager* oc = (DGMessageManager*)clientData;
                        JobContext& bjc = oc->m_bjc;
                        // Get path to transform and export
                        MDagPath dagPath;
                        res = dagNode.getPath(dagPath);
                        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);
                        dagPath.pop();
                        bjc.getSceneManager().getLiveResourceManager().postUpdate(dagPath.node());
                }
        }
}
